string.name: whats_new_text
string.translation_description: Description of new features in this version in html

resources.string:
New in version %s

\t • Welsh language support (many thanks Cymrodor)
\t • Some Norwegian translation fixes (credit: FTNo)
\t • Restored Firebase Analytics
\t • Made the Calibration dialog less aggressive and self-closing
\t • Shortened the End User License Agreement
\t • Retired the temporary data hack for Neowise
\t • Changed the declination lines to be 10 degrees apart instead of 9 and added labels
\t • Moved the time travel dialog controls to the bottom so they do not clash with the Android UI
